member.name: T:Tizen.WebView.BackForwardListItem
member.summary: This class provides the properties of Back Forward list item of a specific WebView.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.BackForwardListItem.#ctor(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Creates a Back Forward List Item object.

member.name: P:Tizen.WebView.BackForwardListItem.Url
member.summary: Url of the back forward list item.

member.name: P:Tizen.WebView.BackForwardListItem.Title
member.summary: Title of the back forward list item.

member.name: P:Tizen.WebView.BackForwardListItem.OriginalUrl
member.summary: Original Url of the back forward list item.

member.name: T:Tizen.WebView.BackForwardList
member.summary: This class provides the properties of Back Forward list of a specific WebView.

member.name: P:Tizen.WebView.BackForwardList.CurrentItem
member.summary: Current item of the back forward list.
member.remarks: BackForward List can be null if there is no current item.

member.name: P:Tizen.WebView.BackForwardList.PreviousItem
member.summary: Previous item of the back forward list and null if no previous item.
member.remarks: BackForward List can be null if there is no previous item.

member.name: P:Tizen.WebView.BackForwardList.Count
member.summary: Gets the back forward list count.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.BackForwardList.BackItems(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the list containing the items preceding the current item limited by limit.
member.param: limit The number of items to retrieve, if limit -1 all items preceding current item are returned.
member.returns: The list of the BackForwardListItem of back items.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.BackForwardList.ForwardItems(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the list containing the items following the current item limited by limit.
member.param: limit The number of items to retrieve, if limit is -1 all items following current item are returned.
member.returns: The list of the BackForwardListItem of forward items.

member.name: T:Tizen.WebView.Chromium
member.summary: This class provides the methods to initialize and shutdown the Chromium-efl.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.Chromium.Initialize
member.returns: A reference count of the Chromium's instance.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.Chromium.Shutdown
member.summary: Decreases a reference count of the WebKit's instance, possibly destroying it.
member.returns: A reference count of the Chromium's instance.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.Chromium.SetArguments(System.String[])
member.summary: Sets argument count and argument array for Chromium.
member.param: Argument array. The first value of array must be program's name.

member.name: F:Tizen.WebView.CacheModel.DocumentBrowser
member.summary: Use the bigger cache capacity than DocumentBrowser.

member.name: T:Tizen.WebView.Context
member.summary: This class encapsulates all the pages related to the specific use of the Chromium-efl.
member.remarks: Applications have the option of creating a context different from the default one and using it for a group of pages. All pages in the same context share the same preferences, visited link set, local storage, and so on.

member.name: T:Tizen.WebView.Context.DownloadRequestDelegate
member.summary: The delegate for handling download request.
member.param: url of the download request.

member.name: T:Tizen.WebView.Context.InterceptRequestDelegate
member.summary: The delegate for intercepting and handling a resource request.
member.param: The object which can handle a intercepted request.

member.name: P:Tizen.WebView.Context.CacheModel
member.remarks: The default cache model is DocumentViewer.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.Context.GetCookieManager
member.summary: Gets the CookieManager object for this context.
member.returns: The CookieManager object.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.Context.ClearResourceCache
member.summary: Clears HTTP caches in the local storage and all resources cached in memory.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.Context.NotifyLowMemory
member.summary: Informs the WebEngine low memory to release unused memory.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.Context.SetDownloadRequestDelegate(Tizen.WebView.Context.DownloadRequestDelegate)
member.summary: Sets the delegate function for download request.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.Context.SetInterceptRequestDelegate(Tizen.WebView.Context.InterceptRequestDelegate)
member.summary: Sets the delegate function for intercepting a resource request.
member.param: The delegate function for intercepting a resource request.

member.name: M:Tizen.WebView.Context.StartInspectorServer(System.UInt32)
member.param: The port number.

if true the context menu item is enabled else false.

member.name: T:Tizen.WebView.CookieAcceptPolicy
member.summary: Enumeration for the cookies accept policies.

member.name: F:Tizen.WebView.CookieAcceptPolicy.Always
member.summary: Accepts every cookie sent from any page.

member.name: F:Tizen.WebView.CookieAcceptPolicy.NoThirdParty
member.summary: Accepts only cookies set by the main document that is loaded.

member.summary: Enumeration for creating a type name for the storage of persistent cookies.

member.name: F:Tizen.WebView.CookiePersistentStorage.Text
member.summary: Cookies are stored in a text file in the Mozilla "cookies.txt" format.

member.name: F:Tizen.WebView.CookiePersistentStorage.SqlLite
member.summary: Cookies are stored in a SQLite file in the current Mozilla format.

member.param: The cookie acceptance policy.

member.summary: Sets the storage where the non-session cookies are stored persistently, to read/write the cookies.

The type of storage.
